Title: Redux Pattern in Blazor
Description: In this blog post, we will use the Redux pattern with a small Blazor application. To demonstrate the inner workings, we will built everything from scratch.

Title: Choosing diagnostic IDs - C#
Description: This overview provides an understanding of how to choose a diagnostic ID

Title: Vertical Slice Architecture
Description:
Layered architectures are the foundation of many software systems. However, layered architectures organize the system around technical layers. And the cohesion between layers is low.
What if you wanted to organize the system around features instead? This is where Vertical Slice Architecture comes in.
